verses.name: Matthew 10:18
verses.text: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them and the Gentiles.

verses.name: Matthew 10:19
verses.text: But when they deliver you up, take no thought how or what ye shall speak: for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak.

verses.name: Matthew 10:20
verses.text: For it is not ye that speak, but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you.

verses.name: Matthew 10:21
verses.text: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death, and the father the child: and the children shall rise up against their parents, and cause them to be put to death.
